title: Hitler The Rise of Evil Movie
creator: EZTakes

extendedInfo.description: Boasting a star-studded cast, this epic mini-series traces the mind of a burgeoning madman as he begins his ruthless climb to power. From his emergence out of the ashes of WWI through the birth of the Nazi Party, acclaimed actor Robert Carlyle portrays...more at www.eztakes.com. (Duration: 186 Minutes)
